00021 using System;
00022 using System.Text;
00023 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00024 
00025 using Gtk;
00026 
00027 using Niry;
00028 using Niry.Utils;
00029 
00030 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.Talk {
00031     public class TalkView : TextView {
00032         private TextIter endIter;
00033         private TextMark endMark;
00034         private TextTag linkTag;
00035         
00036         private DateTime lastMessage;
00037         
00038         private bool hoveringOverLink;
00039         private Gdk.Cursor normalCursor;
00040         private Gdk.Cursor handCursor;
00041         
00042         private const string URL_REGEX = @"((\b((news|http|https|ftp|file|irc)://|mailto:|(www|ftp)\.|\S*@\S*\.)|(^|\s)/\S+/|(^|\s)~/\S+)\S*\b/?)";
00043 
00044         private static Regex regex = new Regex(URL_REGEX, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);
00045         
00046         private static Regex emoticonRegex;
00047         
00048         private static string[,] emoticons = {
00049             {"face-angel", "0:-)"},
00050             {"face-angel", "0:)"},
00051             {"face-crying", ":'("},
00052             {"face-devil-grin", ">:-)"},
00053             {"face-devil-grin", ">:)"},
00054             {"face-devil-sad", ">:-("},
00055             {"face-devil-sad", ">:("},
00056             {"face-glasses", "B-)"},
00057             {"face-glasses", "B)"},
00058             {"face-kiss", ":-*"},
00059             {"face-kiss", ":*"},
00060             {"face-monkey", ":-(|)"},
00061             {"face-monkey", ":(|)"},
00062             {"face-plain", ":-|"},
00063             {"face-plain", ":|"},
00064             {"face-sad", ":-("},
00065             {"face-sad", ":("},
00066             {"face-smile", ":)"},
00067             {"face-smile-big", ":-D"},
00068             {"face-smile-big", ":D"},
00069             {"face-smirk", ":-!"},
00070             {"face-smirk", ":!"},
00071             {"face-surprise", ":-0"},
00072             {"face-surprise", ":0"},
00073             {"face-wink", ";-)"},
00074             {"face-wink", ";)"}
00075         };
00076         
00077         // ============================================
00078         // PUBLIC Methods
00079         // ============================================
00080         static TalkView() {
00081             // Create the emoticon regex
00082             StringBuilder regex = new StringBuilder(@"(^|(?<=[^\w]))(");
00083             for (int i = 0; i < emoticons.Length / 2; i++) {
00084                 if (i != 0) {
00085                     regex.Append("|");
00086                 }
00087                 string emoticon = Regex.Escape(emoticons[i, 1]);
00088                 regex.Append(emoticon);
00089             }
00090             regex.Append(@")((?=[^\w])|$)");
00091             
00092             emoticonRegex = new Regex(regex.ToString(),
00093                 RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);
00094         }
00095         
00096         public TalkView() : base(new TextBuffer(null)) {
00097             CursorVisible = false;
00098             Editable = false;
00099             WrapMode = WrapMode.WordChar;
00100             
00101             lastMessage = DateTime.MinValue;
00102             
00103             normalCursor = new Gdk.Cursor(Gdk.CursorType.Xterm);
00104             handCursor = new Gdk.Cursor(Gdk.CursorType.Hand2);
00105             
00106             TextTag tag;
00107             tag = new TextTag("status");
00108             tag.Foreground = "darkgrey";
00109             tag.Weight = Pango.Weight.Bold;
00110             Buffer.TagTable.Add(tag);
00111             
00112             tag = new TextTag("error");
00113             tag.Foreground = "dark red";
00114             Buffer.TagTable.Add(tag);
00115             
00116             tag = new TextTag("time");
00117             tag.Foreground = "darkgrey";
00118             tag.Justification = Justification.Center;
00119             Buffer.TagTable.Add(tag);
00120             
00121             linkTag = new TextTag("link");
00122             linkTag.Foreground = "blue";
00123             linkTag.Underline = Pango.Underline.Single;
00124             Buffer.TagTable.Add(linkTag);
00125             
00126             tag = new TextTag("nick-self");
00127             tag.Foreground = "sea green";
00128             tag.Weight = Pango.Weight.Bold;
00129             Buffer.TagTable.Add(tag);
00130             
00131             tag = new TextTag("nick-other");
00132             tag.Foreground = "skyblue4";
00133             tag.Weight = Pango.Weight.Bold;
00134             Buffer.TagTable.Add(tag);
00135             
00136             endIter = Buffer.GetIterAtOffset(0);
00137             endMark = Buffer.CreateMark("end", endIter, true);
00138         }
00139 
00140         // ============================================
00141         // PUBLIC Methods
00142         // ============================================
00143         public void InsertError (string error) {
00144             InsertText(error, "error");
00145         }
00146         
00147         public void InsertStatus (string status) {
00148             InsertText (status, "status");
00149         }
00150         
00151         public void InsertText (string message, string tag) {
00152             InsertTimestamp();
00153             
00154             Buffer.InsertWithTagsByName(ref endIter, message + "\n", tag);
00155             ScrollToEnd();
00156         }
00157         
00158         public void InsertMessage (string nick, string message, bool self) {
00159             InsertTimestamp();
00160             
00161             Buffer.InsertWithTagsByName(ref endIter, nick + ": ",
00162                 self ? "nick-self" : "nick-other");
00163             
00164             int pos = 0;
00165             foreach (Match match in regex.Matches(message)) {
00166                 Group group = match.Groups[1];
00167                 
00168                 if (pos < group.Index) {
00169                     InsertMessageWithEmoticons(
00170                         message.Substring(pos, group.Index - pos));
00171                 }
00172                 
00173                 Buffer.InsertWithTagsByName(ref endIter,
00174                     message.Substring(group.Index, group.Length),
00175                     "link");
00176                 
00177                 pos = group.Index + group.Length;
00178             }
00179             
00180             InsertMessageWithEmoticons(message.Substring(pos) + "\n");
00181             ScrollToEnd();
00182         }
00183         
00184         // ============================================
00185         // PROTECTED Methods
00186         // ============================================
00187         protected override bool OnButtonPressEvent(Gdk.EventButton evnt) {
00188             if (evnt.Button != 1) {
00189                 return base.OnButtonPressEvent(evnt);
00190             }
00191             
00192             int x, y;
00193             WindowToBufferCoords (Gtk.TextWindowType.Text, (int)evnt.X,
00194                 (int)evnt.Y, out x, out y);
00195             
00196             TextIter iter = GetIterAtLocation(x, y);
00197             if (iter.HasTag(linkTag)) {
00198                 TextIter end = iter;
00199                 if (iter.BackwardToTagToggle(linkTag) &&
00200                     end.ForwardToTagToggle(linkTag)) 
00201                 {
00202                     // Open URL
00203                     UrlUtils.OpenLink(GetUrl(iter, end));
00204                     return true;
00205                 }
00206             }
00207             
00208             return base.OnButtonPressEvent(evnt);
00209         }
00210 
00211         protected override bool OnMotionNotifyEvent(Gdk.EventMotion evnt) {
00212             int pointerX, pointerY;
00213             Gdk.ModifierType pointerMask;
00214             
00215             Gdk.Window window = GetWindow(TextWindowType.Text);
00216             window.GetPointer(out pointerX, out pointerY, out pointerMask);
00217             
00218             int x, y;
00219             this.WindowToBufferCoords(TextWindowType.Widget, pointerX, pointerY,
00220                 out x, out y);
00221             
00222             TextIter iter = GetIterAtLocation(x, y);
00223             bool hovering = iter.HasTag(linkTag);
00224             
00225             if (hovering != hoveringOverLink) {
00226                 hoveringOverLink = hovering;
00227                 if (hoveringOverLink) {
00228                     window.Cursor = handCursor;
00229                 } else {
00230                     window.Cursor = normalCursor;
00231                 }
00232             }
00233             
00234             return base.OnMotionNotifyEvent(evnt);
00235         }
00236         
00237         // ============================================
00238         // PRIVATE Methods
00239         // ============================================
00240         private void InsertMessageWithEmoticons(string message) {
00241             int pos = 0;
00242             foreach (Match match in emoticonRegex.Matches(message)) {
00243                 if (pos < match.Index) {
00244                     Buffer.Insert(ref endIter,
00245                         message.Substring(pos, match.Index - pos));
00246                 }
00247                 
00248                 string emoticon = match.Value;
00249                 string iconName = GetIconName(emoticon);
00250                 
00251                 if (iconName != null) {
00252                     Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(null, iconName + ".png");
00253                     
00254                     Buffer.InsertPixbuf(ref endIter, pixbuf);
00255                 } else {
00256                     Buffer.Insert(ref endIter, emoticon);
00257                 }
00258                 
00259                 pos = match.Index + match.Length;
00260             }
00261             Buffer.Insert(ref endIter, message.Substring(pos));
00262         }
00263         
00264         private string GetIconName(string emoticon) {
00265             for (int i = 0; i < emoticons.Length / 2; i++) {
00266                 if (emoticons[i, 1] == emoticon) {
00267                     return emoticons[i, 0];
00268                 }
00269             }
00270             return null;
00271         }
00272         
00273         private bool InsertTimestamp() {
00274             TimeSpan elapsed = DateTime.Now - lastMessage;
00275             lastMessage = DateTime.Now;
00276             
00277             if (elapsed.TotalMinutes > 5) {
00278                 Buffer.InsertWithTagsByName(ref endIter,
00279                     DateTime.Now.ToString("HH:mm") + "\n", "time");
00280                 return true;
00281             }
00282             return false;
00283         }
00284                 
00285         private void ScrollToEnd() {
00286             if (Parent is ScrolledWindow) {
00287                 ScrolledWindow scrolledWindow = Parent as ScrolledWindow;
00288                 
00289                 Adjustment adjustment = scrolledWindow.Vadjustment;
00290                 bool scroll = adjustment.Value >= adjustment.Upper -
00291                 adjustment.PageSize;
00292                 
00293                 if (scroll) {
00294                     Buffer.MoveMark(endMark, endIter);
00295                     ScrollMarkOnscreen(endMark);
00296                 }
00297             }
00298         }
00299 
00300         private string GetUrl(TextIter start, TextIter end) {
00301             string url = start.GetText(end).Trim();
00302             
00303             // Add to 'http://' to the front of www.foo.com
00304             // 'ftp://' to ftp.foo.com,
00305             // 'mailto:' to alex@foo.com
00306             if (url.StartsWith("www.")) {
00307                 url = "http://" + url;
00308             } else if (url.StartsWith("ftp.")) {
00309                 url = "ftp://" + url;
00310             } else if (url.IndexOf("@") > 1 && url.IndexOf(".") > 3 && !url.StartsWith("mailto:")) {
00311                 url = "mailto:" + url;
00312             }
00313             return(url);
00314         }
00315     }
00316 }
